channel.title: Please help
channel.description:
every time i try to compile my client is giving me this error::
' javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue . . .
-- aslo in it i added::
@echo off title Building Files javac -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java pause
---- i have tryed::
@echo off Title Building Files "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" ./files/*.java pause
-- but its not working please help

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Have you set your environment variables?
downloaded jkd?

Read full topic

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @ERS ERS
item.description:
@ERS wrote:

[quote=“Mariokillu, post:2, topic:372037”]@echo off
Title Building Files
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

Just had to remove ./files/*[/quote]

its says::
javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
press any key to continue

Read full topic

operable program or batch file.
